meanings.definition: Tending to melt or capable of melting.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream became melty under the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The chocolate was melty and gooey.
meanings.sent3: The melty cheese on the pizza stretched as I took a slice.
meanings.sent4: The melty snowflakes covered the ground like a soft blanket.
meanings.sent5: The candle wax was so melty that it dripped down the side of the table.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being melted.
meanings.sent1: The melty of the ice cream cone dripped onto my hand.
meanings.sent2: I love the melty of warm chocolate on a dessert.
meanings.sent3: The melty of the cheese made the sandwich extra delicious.
meanings.sent4: The melty of the candle created a pool of wax on the table.
meanings.sent5: The melty of the snow made it perfect for building a snowman.
